report.cta-999: If you're reporting a crime that's happening right now or if there's a threat to someone's life, call 999 immediately.

confirm.header: Check the details before submitting the report
confirm.about-privacy-blurb: Your contact details will only be used if further information is required. Your details will remain confidential and will not be used for any other purpose or passed on to any other parties. We keep your personal data secure according to our privacy policy.

confirmation.subheader: Thank you, we have received your report.
confirmation.thankyou: Thankyou for your submission. Alerting the authorities to terrorist material can help save lives.
confirmation.copy-sent: We have sent a copy of your report to the police team dealing with online terrorist material.
confirmation.contact-details: If they require more information, they may get in touch with you.
confirmation.feedback-link: Tell us what you think of this form

information.subject: Report Online Terrorist Materials: Form submitted
information.contact-details: The user consented to be contacted
information.no-contact-details: The user did not consent to be contacted
information.customer-intro: Thankyou for your report regarding terrorist materials. Here is the data which we have recorded:
information.customer-contact-details: You consented to be contacted if necessary, with the following contact details:
